appDescription.message: Cross-post WeChat Official Account articles to multiple platforms—draft or publish—with built-in diagnostics.

settingAutoClose.description: Auto close original page setting label

articleFilled.message: Article content filled, please publish manually
articleFilled.description: Article filled, manual publish needed message

titleInputNotFound.description: Title input not found error message

contentEditorNotFound.description: Content editor not found error message

publishButtonNotFound.description: Publish button not found error message

sendToBackgroundFailed.description: Send to background failed error message

panelStarted.message: Job started: opening editors for all channels...

panelDiagnosisHint.message: Select a channel to view diagnosis.

imagePolicyHint.message: Images detected: no image upload in this version; hotlinking original images by default. If the platform blocks hotlinks, please re-upload/replace images manually.

panelDiagnosisNoJobHint.message: Choose an action and click Start.
panelDiagnosisNoJobHint.description: Panel hint when no job started

v2SugCheckLoginOrDomThenRetry.message: Check your login status / page layout changes, then retry.

v2SugCheckSourceLinkAtEndThenContinue.message: Check whether the end of the content includes “原文链接”. Add it manually if needed, then click “Continue”.

v2MsgVerifyPassedDetailHasSourceLink.message: Verification passed: the details page contains the source link.

v2MsgVerifyFailedDetailNoSourceLink.message: Verification failed: source link not detected on the details page.

v2MsgPleaseConfirmDraftSaved.message: Confirm that the draft has been saved.

v2MsgVerifyFoundTitleOpeningDetail.message: Verification: found the title on the list page. Opening details…

v2MsgVerifyBlockedNoDetailLink.message: Verification blocked: found the title but couldn't extract the details link.

v2SugOpenDetailManuallyThenWaitVerify.message: Open the details page manually, then wait there for automatic verification.

v2MsgAppendedSourceLinkKeepOriginal.message: Source link appended to the end (posted as original).

v2MsgAppendedSourceLinkNoSourceFieldInOr.message: Source link appended to the end (no source field available in the platform's original mode).

v2SugIfNoSourceFieldAppendToEnd.message: If the platform doesn't support a source link field, the source link will be appended to the end.

v2SugFillSourceFieldManually.message: If you need to fill the platform “Source link/Attribution” field, please do it manually.

v2MsgContentWrittenByCkeditorSourceAppen.message: Content written to the editor (CKEditor API). Source link appended to the end.

v2MsgVerifyListNoTitleRefresh5s6.message: Verification: title not found in the list. Auto-refreshing in 5s ($1/6)…

v2MsgVerifyListNoTitleRefresh6s20.message: Verification: title not found in the list. Auto-refreshing in 6s ($1/20)…

v2MsgVerifyListNoTitleRefresh8s12.message: Verification: title not found in the list. Auto-refreshing in 8s ($1/12)…

v2MsgVerifyListNoNewArticleRefresh3s24.message: Verification: new article not found yet. Auto-refreshing in 3s ($1/24)…

v2MsgVerifyListNoNewArticleRefresh3s36.message: Verification: new article not found yet. Auto-refreshing in 3s ($1/36)…

v2MsgVerifyTokenNotMatchedProbingDetails.message: Verification: token not matched directly; probing detail pages ($1/$2)…

v2MsgVerifyNotFoundNewArticleProbingDeta.message: Verification: couldn't locate the new article directly; probing detail pages ($1/$2)…

v2MsgVerifyNoSourceOnPageBackToListProbe.message: Verification: source link not found on this page. Going back to the list to continue probing…

v2MsgPublishTriggeredGoPostsListVerify.message: Publish triggered. Navigating to the posts list for verification.

v2MsgVerifyFailedListStillNoTitleMaybeRe.message: Verification failed: still can't find the title on the list page (publish may have failed or is under review).

v2MsgDetectedSuccessPageGetDetailLinkVer.message: Publish success page detected. Getting the detail link and jumping to verification…

v2MsgGoManageListVerify.message: Navigating to the article management list for verification…

v2MsgVerifyFindNewArticleInList.message: Verification: find the new article on the list page.

v2MsgVerifyFoundPublishedDetailLinkOpeni.message: Verification: found the published detail link on the list page. Opening details…

v2MsgVerifyFoundNewArticleOpeningDetail.message: Verification: found the new article on the list page. Opening details…

v2MsgCsdnVerifyListNoNewArticleRefresh5s.message: Verification: new article not found in the list ($1). Auto-refreshing in 5s ($2/36)…

v2MsgVerifyFailedListStillNoNewArticle.message: Verification failed: still can't locate the new article in the list (it may not be published yet / under review / list link not generated).

v2SugWaitEditorLoadThenRetry.message: Wait for the editor to finish loading and retry. If the page just opened, wait 2 seconds and click “Retry”.

v2MsgSettingOriginalType.message: Setting the article type to Original…

v2MsgSavingDraftToGenerateId.message: Saving draft (to generate an article ID)…

v2SugHandleModalRiskRequiredThenContinue.message: If a popup/risk-control/required fields appears, handle it manually and then click “Continue” or “Retry” in the panel.

v2MsgPublishClickedWaitingRedirectOrInde.message: Publish clicked. Waiting for redirect or indexing…

v2MsgPublishTriggeredGoManageListVerify.message: Publish triggered. Navigating to the article management list for verification.

v2SugCsdnConfirmPublishThenRefreshOrWait.message: Confirm publishing succeeded, then refresh the management page. If it's under review, wait for indexing and click “Continue”.

v2SugTencentNoSourceUrlFieldAppend.message: Tencent Cloud Dev (original mode) has no “Article Source URL” field; the source link will be appended to the end.

v2SugContentTooShortMin140AlreadyAutoPad.message: The platform requires at least 140 characters. We tried auto-padding; if it’s still not enough, add content manually and continue.

v2MsgContentTooShortAutoPadAndRepublish.message: Blocked by platform validation (content < 140 chars). Auto-padding and retrying publish…

v2SugHandleRequiredCaptchaModalThenConti.message: If required fields/captcha/popup appears, handle it manually and then click “Continue” or “Retry” in the panel.

v2SugAdjustFormatAtEnd.message: If you want to adjust formatting, you can edit it at the end.

v2MsgRedirectedToDetailStartVerify.message: Redirected to the article details page. Starting verification.

v2MsgVerifyMatchedTokenBySearchOpeningDe.message: Verification: matched the title token via search. Opening details…

v2MsgVerifyFailedListNoArticleWithSource.message: Verification failed: couldn't locate an article that contains the source link on the list page.

v2SugConfirmPublishIndexedOrSearchTitleT.message: Confirm publishing is complete and the article is indexed. You can also search the title on the list page, then click “Continue”.

v2SugCnblogsNoSourceFieldAppend.message: CNBlogs has no source link field; the source link will be appended to the end.

v2SugHandleModalRequiredThenContinueOrRe.message: If a popup/required fields appears, handle it manually and then click “Continue” or “Retry” in the panel.

v2MsgVerifyFindNewPostInList.message: Verification: find the new post on the list page.

v2MsgVerifyFailedListStillNoTitle.message: Verification failed: still can't find the title on the list page.

v2SugConfirmPublishOrWaitIndexRefreshThe.message: Confirm publishing is finished, or wait for indexing, then refresh and click “Continue”.

v2SugOschinaNoSourceFieldAppend.message: OSCHINA (original mode) has no usable source link field; the source link will be appended to the end.

v2MsgOschinaGoProfileWriteBlogPage.message: Navigating to your profile's “Write Blog” page…

v2MsgOschinaStillOnEntryNeedWriteBlogOrR.message: Still on the entry page; you may need to click “写博客” or log in again.

v2SugOschinaLoginThenClickWriteBlogThenC.message: Make sure you're logged in to OSCHINA, click “写博客”, then click “Continue” in the panel.

v2MsgOschinaSpaceMigrationSwitchToWriteP.message: Space migration detected. Switching to the actual writing page…

v2MsgAlreadyInDetailVerifySourceLink.message: Detected that we’re already on the detail page; verifying the source link directly…

v2MsgOschinaPublishTriggeredGoProfileVer.message: Publish triggered. Navigating to your profile for verification.

v2MsgVerifyOschinaSpaceMigrationSwitchTo.message: Verification: space migration detected. Switching to the actual space list…

v2MsgVerifySwitchToBlogList.message: Verification: switching to the blog list page…

v2MsgVerifyFilteringBlogListByKeyword.message: Verification: filtering the blog list by keyword…

v2MsgVerifyMatchedTokenByKeywordOpeningD.message: Verification: matched the title token via keyword filter. Opening details…

v2SugWoshipmNoSourceFieldAppend.message: WoShiPM has no source link field; the source link will be appended to the end.

v2MsgIdentityVerificationRequiredComplet.message: Identity verification is required. Complete it on this page, then continue.

v2SugDoneThenClickContinue.message: Once done, click “Continue” in the panel.

v2MsgPleaseConfirmReviewSubmitted.message: Confirm that the review submission has completed.

v2MsgWoshipmReviewSubmittedGoMyArticlesV.message: Review submitted. Navigating to “My Articles” for verification.

v2MsgVerifyLocateNewArticleInMyArticles.message: Verification: locate the new article in “My Articles”.

v2MsgVerifyMatchedTokenInListApiOpeningD.message: Verification: matched the title token in the list API ($1). Opening details…

v2MsgVerifyListOrDetailNotRecognizedRefr.message: Verification: list/details not recognized. Auto-refreshing in 5s ($1/6)…

v2MsgVerifyBlockedListNoNewArticle.message: Verification blocked: couldn't locate the new article on the list page.

v2SugWoshipmSwitchTabsThenContinue.message: On “My Articles”, switch to “Under Review / Published / Drafts” and confirm you can see the new article, then click “Continue”.

v2MsgMowenFillingContentTitleFirstLine.message: Filling content (first line is the title)…

v2SugMowenTitleInFirstLine.message: Mowen has no separate title field; the title will be written as the first line.

v2MsgMowenPublishTriggeredGoNotesListVer.message: Publish triggered. Navigating to the notes list for verification.

v2MsgVerifyFindNewNoteInList.message: Verification: find the new note on the list page.

v2MsgVerifyFailedListNoTitleTitleIsFirst.message: Verification failed: still can't find the title on the list page (title is the first line of the content).

v2SugRefreshListThenContinue.message: Refresh the list page, then click “Continue”.

v2SugSspaiNoSourceFieldAppend.message: SSPAI has no source link field; the source link will be appended to the end.

v2MsgIdentityVerificationRequiredToPubli.message: Identity verification is required before you can publish.

v2SugCompleteIdentityVerificationThenCon.message: Complete identity verification on this page, then click “Continue” in the panel.

v2MsgVerifyConfirmPublishedVisibleOnDeta.message: Verification: confirm the article is published and visible on the details page.

v2MsgVerifyBlockedNotPublishedYet.message: Verification blocked: the article is not published yet (may require identity verification / missing required fields).

v2SugCompleteVerificationOrRequiredThenC.message: Complete identity verification or required fields on this page, then click “Continue” to retry publishing and verification.

v2MsgSspaiPublishTriggeredButNotInVerifi.message: Publish triggered, but did not reach a verifiable page (/write#id or /post/id).

v2SugCheckRequiredOrIdentityThenContinue.message: Check if there are required fields or identity verification prompts. Handle them, then click “Continue”.

v2MsgBaijiahaoSecurityVerifyTriggered.message: Baidu security verification triggered on Baijiahao. Complete the slider/QR verification first, then continue…

v2SugBaijiahaoNoSourceFieldAppend.message: Baijiahao has no source link field; the source link will be appended to the end.

v2MsgPublishBlockedBySecurityVerify.message: Publishing was blocked by security verification. Complete the verification (QR code/phone) in the popup, then continue…

v2MsgPublishTriggeredGoWorksListVerify.message: Publish triggered. Navigating to the works list for verification.

v2MsgVerifyFindNewArticleInWorksList.message: Verification: find the new article in the works list.

v2MsgVerifySetListSearchKeyword.message: Verification: setting the list search keyword: $1

v2MsgVerifyFoundTitleInListOpeningDetail.message: Verification: found the title in the "$1" list. Opening details…

v2SugToutiaoNoSourceFieldAppend.message: Toutiao has no source link field; the source link will be appended to the end.

v2MsgToutiaoSavePublishFailedSaveFailed.message: Toutiao save/publish failed (platform response: save failed).

v2SugToutiaoHandleRequiredFieldsThenCont.message: Check if there are required fields (e.g., cover/category/declaration) or risk-control prompts. Handle them, then click “Continue” to retry verification.

v2SugConfirmPublishedNoRequiredRefreshTh.message: Confirm it was published successfully and no required fields are missing, then refresh the list and click “Continue”.

v2MsgVerifyPassedListNewArticlePublished.message: Verification passed: the new article is visible on the list page (Published).

v2MsgOutOfScopeReturningToEditor.message: This page is out of the expected scope. Returning to the editor…

v2MsgFeishuCreatingBlankDoc.message: Creating a new Feishu doc (blank doc)…

v2MsgFeishuApiCreateFailedFallbackUi.message: API document creation failed; falling back to the UI click flow…

v2MsgFeishuTitleAreaNotFoundSkipUseFilen.message: Title area not found; skipped (using the file name as the title).

v2SugFeishuNoSourceFieldAppend.message: Feishu Docs has no source link field; the source link will be appended to the end.

v2MsgFeishuContentWrittenBackToFolderVer.message: Content written. Returning to the folder list for verification.

v2MsgVerifyFindNewDocInFolderList.message: Verification: find the new doc in the folder list.

v2MsgVerifyFailedFolderListNoTitle.message: Verification failed: still can't find the title in the folder list.

v2MsgVerifyFoundTitleOpeningDocDetail.message: Verification: found the title on the list page. Opening doc details…

v2MsgVerifyBlockedNoDocLink.message: Verification blocked: found the title but couldn't get the doc link.

v2SugFeishuOpenDocDetailManuallyThenWait.message: Open the doc details page manually, then wait there for automatic verification.

v2MsgVerifyPassedSavedToCloudAndHasSourc.message: Verification passed: saved to cloud and the doc contains the source link.

v2MsgVerifyFailedNoSavedToCloudOrSource.message: Verification failed: didn't detect “已保存到云端” or the source link.

v2SugFeishuConfirmSavedToCloudAndSourceT.message: Confirm the page shows “已经保存到云端” and the content ends with “原文链接”, then click “Continue”.
